recipe_name: Cheesy bacon wraps with red pepper relish
author: Tony Tobin
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. For the wraps, wrap the bacon around the cheese and place onto a baking sheet and place into the oven to bake for ten minutes, or until the bacon is cooked. For the red pepper relish, place all of the relish ingredients into a small saucepan over a medium heat and simmer for ten minutes, or until the peppers and onions are cooked. Serve the cheese and bacon wraps on a plate with the salsa in a bowl to the side.
ingredients: 3 x 15g/ ½oz batons of Gruyère cheese,  3 slices bacon,  1 red pepper, finely sliced,  ¼ onion, finely sliced,  1 tsp red wine vinegar,  1 tsp caster sugar
